name: next-ghpages-template
description: A template for clients should use the Github Pages, React and SSR using NextJS.

scripts.deploy:export: npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deploy:commit: git add out/ && git commit -m "deploy: new features"
scripts.deploy:clean: git branch -D deploy/stage && git reset HEAD~1 --hard
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:export && npm run deploy:setup && npm run deploy:commit && npm run deploy:stage && npm run deploy:push && npm run deploy:clean

author: Matheus Alves
